value:
$WmMPID_チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|So, I must be tough and rich. What
else did they say? Oh, I must take
care not to get cold feet!$k$pI wonder why that's important. And
how am I going to find warm socks
that match my dress?!$k$p$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Tiki... We really ought to reconsider
our approach to this...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁フラヴィア,ch04_46_Flavia_F_Wedding22,Face|Hope you're ready for the world's
strongest bride. This dress won't
slow me down one bit!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁アンナ覚醒,ch04_39_Anna_F_Wedding22,Face|This bouquet is going to be great for
me. Think of the resale value!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁サイリ,ch04_41_Sairi_F_Wedding22,Face|P'raps you thought me bumbling
before, but mark me well: I shall
not repeat that blunder!$k$p$WmMPID_花婿ルフレ男,ch04_07_Reflet_M_Wedding22,Face|Isn't this supposed to be a festival
of love? I'm starting to wonder if I'll
even survive it...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Mar-Mar! Mar-Mar!$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|Hello, Tiki. You seem very excited.
Is there something I can help with?$k$p$WmMPID_チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Big Tiki and I won the festival
tournament! That means we get
to be in a special ceremony!$k$pI'm going to be a bride, but...we'll
need a groom, and I was wondering
if you might... Would you?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|You want me to be your groom?
This is, ah, very sudden...$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|I understand it's a lot to ask, but
I hope you'll at least consider it.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|Goodness—you must be "Big Tiki"...
Sorry, this is a lot to take in all at
once. I feel a little faint...$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Hehe... It's good to see you, Mar-Mar.$k$pPerhaps "Future Tiki" would be more
apt. I am not from your world, nor
your time. Far from both, in fact.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|I see that, even if I can hardly believe
my eyes. The future must be...lovely.$k$p$WmMPID_チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Heehee...$k$p$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|I will say this: since I am from the
future, I know well what lies ahead.$k$pI know what is in store for Archanea,
and what paths you and young Tiki
here will take.$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|Ah... I understand.$k$p$WmMPID_双界チキ覚醒,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Despite that, I still wish for Tiki to
rest easy when next she slumbers.$k$pThis joyous occasion would give her
many good dreams. Is that too much
to ask of you?$k$p$WmMPID_花婿マルス,ch01_00_Marth_M_Wedding18,Face|Of course not. Give me a moment
to take care of a few things, and then
I will join you for the ceremony.$k$p$WmMPID_チキ,ch04_12_Tiki_FF_Pair,Face|Hooray! Thank you, Mar-Mar! And
you too, Big Tiki! This will be a
dream come true!$k$p$nMPID_双界チキ覚醒|Then it was worth the effort. I'm glad
to hear it.$k$pPlease accept my sincerest thanks as
well, Mar-Mar. Both of us will cherish
this memory forever.$k$p$Sbs150|
